creditline: Courtesy of the Artist and Pace/MacGill gallery, New York
description:
one silver CD-R disc in one green Jewel case; 4 ambient videos, looped

untitled [four part video polyptych]
disc says "C 2014 JoAnn Verburg. Do not make unauthorized copies. Untitled (so far). 4 Fonti Grasses videos- to loop to show- to return all copies"

video shown on four screens oriented vertically;images of a flowing body of water with vegitation
title: SACRED SPRINGS x 4 (from the FONTI DEL CLITUNNO)
